topic: Cognitive biases affecting renewable energy adoption
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that by actively seeking out areas where I have limited knowledge or strong assumptions, I can uncover surprising insights that challenge my current perspective. As a next step, I will engage in conversations with individuals from diverse backgrounds and explore resources outside my typical realm of interest to identify unexpected information or viewpoints. This approach will help me systematically broaden my understanding and embrace potential surprises.

metadata.trigger: What would surprise me if I found it?
